# Changelog

### 1.0.0

2023-11-03

#### Added
- Initial project layout
- Image processing library
- CMake support
- CMake toolchains support
- CMake preset support
- Conan 2.0 support
- Clang tools support
- Sanitizer support
- Examples
- Benchmarking
- Doxygen support
- Unit tests
- Integration tests
- Project examples
- Docker support
- CI/CD support
